org.resthub.identity.service.tracability

Interface ServiceListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IdentityUserDetailsService

    public interface ServiceListener
    This interface defines method needed to be notified when modification occurs on a service

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChange(String type, Object... arguments)
      Notification method, invoked by the service when something noticeable happens.

    • Method Detail

      • onChange

        void onChange(String type,
            Object... arguments)
        Notification method, invoked by the service when something noticeable happens.
        Parameters:
        type - Notification type.
        arguments - Arguments, specific on each notifications.
